title: Love Island's Olivia Attwood flashes new ring days after getting engaged in Dubai
text:

Olivia Attwood has flashed a new engagement ring days after boyfriend Bradley Dack proposed in Dubai.

The Love Island star, 28, flashed a heart-shaped diamond in a loved-up picture with the footballer, 25, as they shared their happy news over the weekend.

She has since landed back in Britain and got back to work filming Towie in Esseex - and Olivia was seen showing off a second ring.

As she posed for pictures during an outing in Brentwood today, Olivia held up her left hand to flash a much less glitzy band.

The second ring is more simple than her diamond sparkler, featuring a plain silver band through a clear crystal.

Olivia hasn't divulged why she swapped out her ring, but it could be because she might not feel comfortable wearing such a hefty diamond to work or she could be having the original re-sized.

(Image: Beretta/Sims/REX)

The happy couple confirmed their engagement news on Sunday night, sharing a picture of themselves smooching during their holiday in Dubai.

Olivia was seen holding up her unusual, heart-shaped ring in the sweet snap.

She captioned the picture: "He must be crazy... Here’s to forever. I love you BD."

Olivia and Bradley have been together on and off for four years, and she was in a relationship with him before her stint on Love Island, where she met now-ex Chris Hughes.

(Image: Beretta/Sims/REX)

(Image: Beretta/Sims/REX)

After a brief romance with Chris, she dumped her Love Island co-star and went back to Bradley.

n a candid chat about the romance, Olivia told new! magazine: "We row about little things, like house-related things. I'm very OCD and he's very messy.

"I've also got a long way to go with trust. That's my own issue more than his. I don't think you should trust any man 100 per cent...

(Image: Beretta/Sims/REX)

"He's got a very kind soul... and he's f**king hot!

"He's got a massive c**k as well! And an amazing bum."
